languages.text: "Да, инфопластина с летописью поставок, которую так безуспешно "искали". По документам частота поставки десятины — каждое терранское десятилетие, установленная норма — тысяча грузовых единиц. Губернатор удержал по сотне из последних пяти партий. Значит, у мира нет проблем с исправной поставкой подати — этот вопрос можно считать закрытым".

traits.locale_text: "Летописи поставок. Он держал их при себе, чтобы казначей не смог откопать эти бумаги — при всем желании. Банальный способ задержать нас на планете".

languages.text: "Yes, the data-slate with the shipment chronicle that they spent so much time vainly 'searching' for. According to the records, the tithe period is one Terran decade and the quota prescribed is a thousand cargo units. The governor withheld a hundred units from each of the five most recent shipments. That means this world has no actual difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that matter settled."
languages.original_text: "Да, инфопластина с летописью поставок, которую так безуспешно "искали". По документам частота поставки десятины — каждое терранское десятилетие, установленная норма — тысяча грузовых единиц. Губернатор удержал по сотне из последних пяти партий. Значит, у мира нет проблем с исправной поставкой подати — этот вопрос можно считать закрытым".

That means this world has no difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that question settled."

languages.text: “是的，我找到了他们花了那么多时间‘寻找’的那份货物清单。根据数据板上的记录来看，什一税的缴纳周期是每十泰拉年一次，规定的配额是一千个物资单位。而在最近的五次缴纳中，总督从每批货物中扣留了一百单位的物资。这也意味着，这个世界在缴纳什一税方面并没有实际上的困难，我们可以认为这个问题已经解决了。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, the data-slate with the shipment chronicle that they spent so much time vainly 'searching' for. According to the records, the tithe period is one Terran decade and the quota prescribed is a thousand cargo units. The governor withheld a hundred units from each of the five most recent shipments. That means this world has no actual difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that matter settled."

traits.locale_text: “是的，我找到了他们花了那么多时间‘寻找’的那份货物清单。根据数据板上的记录来看，什一税的缴纳周期是每十泰拉年一次，规定的配额是一千个物资单位。而在最近的五次缴纳中，总督从每批货物中扣留了一百单位的物资。这也意味着，这个世界在缴纳什一税方面并没有实际上的困难，我们可以认为这个问题已经解决了。”

languages.text: 「ああ、積荷の記録が残っているデータスレートですね。やつらは『探し出す』のにかなり無駄な時間を費やしたようです。記録によると、租税期間は10地球年で、その割当ては1000ユニットの貨物となっています。総督は、直近5回の輸送からそれぞれ100ユニットを天引きしていました。つまり、この惑星は租税を通常通り納めるのに何の困難もなかったということです。これで問題は解決したと考えて差し支えありません」
languages.original_text: "Yes, the data-slate with the shipment chronicle that they spent so much time vainly 'searching' for. According to the records, the tithe period is one Terran decade and the quota prescribed is a thousand cargo units. The governor withheld a hundred units from each of the five most recent shipments. That means this world has no actual difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that matter settled."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、積荷の記録が残っているデータスレートですね。やつらは『探し出す』のにかなり無駄な時間を費やしたようです。記録によると、租税期間は10地球年で、その割当ては1000ユニットの貨物となっています。総督は、直近5回の輸送からそれぞれ100ユニットを天引きしていました。つまり、この惑星は租税を通常通り納めるのに何の困難もなかったということです。これで問題は解決したと考えて差し支えありません」

languages.text: «Sí, la tablilla de datos con el manifiesto de carga que tanto tiempo pasaron "buscando" en vano. Según los registros, el plazo del diezmo es de una década terrana y la cuota fijada es de mil unidades de cargamento. El gobernador retuvo un centenar de unidades de cada uno de los cinco últimos envíos. Eso quiere decir que este mundo no tiene ninguna dificultad para suministrar su tributo con regularidad. Podemos dar por zanjada esa cuestión».
languages.original_text: "Yes, the data-slate with the shipment chronicle that they spent so much time vainly 'searching' for. According to the records, the tithe period is one Terran decade and the quota prescribed is a thousand cargo units. The governor withheld a hundred units from each of the five most recent shipments. That means this world has no actual difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that matter settled."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, la tablilla de datos con el manifiesto de carga que tanto tiempo pasaron "buscando" en vano. Según los registros, el plazo del diezmo es de una década terrana y la cuota fijada es de mil unidades de cargamento. El gobernador retuvo un centenar de unidades de cada uno de los cinco últimos envíos. Eso quiere decir que este mundo no tiene ninguna dificultad para suministrar su tributo con regularidad. Podemos dar por zanjada esa cuestión».

languages.text: "Evet, bunca zaman boşuna 'aradıkları' sevkiyat vakayinamesini içeren databela. Kayıtlara göre aşar dönemi, bir Terra on yılıymış. Öngörülen kota ise bin kargo birimiymiş. Vali, son beş sevkiyatın her birinden yüz birim almış. Bu, bu dünyanın aşarını düzenli olarak ödemekte gerçek bir zorluk yaşamadığı anlamına geliyor. Bu meseleyi hallolmuş sayabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Yes, the data-slate with the shipment chronicle that they spent so much time vainly 'searching' for. According to the records, the tithe period is one Terran decade and the quota prescribed is a thousand cargo units. The governor withheld a hundred units from each of the five most recent shipments. That means this world has no actual difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that matter settled."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, bunca zaman boşuna 'aradıkları' sevkiyat vakayinamesini içeren databela. Kayıtlara göre aşar dönemi, bir Terra on yılıymış. Öngörülen kota ise bin kargo birimiymiş. Vali, son beş sevkiyatın her birinden yüz birim almış. Bu, bu dünyanın aşarını düzenli olarak ödemekte gerçek bir zorluk yaşamadığı anlamına geliyor. Bu meseleyi hallolmuş sayabiliriz."

languages.text: « Oui, la plaque de données contenant les manifestes de chargement qu'ils ont passé tant de temps à "chercher" en vain. D'après les archives, la dîme couvre une décennie terrienne et son quota est fixé à mille unités de cargaison. Or, le gouverneur a retenu une centaine d'unités lors des cinq derniers envois. Ce qui signifie que ce monde n'a pas de réelles difficultés à fournir régulièrement son tribut. Nous pouvons donc considérer que l'affaire est close. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, the data-slate with the shipment chronicle that they spent so much time vainly 'searching' for. According to the records, the tithe period is one Terran decade and the quota prescribed is a thousand cargo units. The governor withheld a hundred units from each of the five most recent shipments. That means this world has no actual difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that matter settled."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, la plaque de données contenant les manifestes de chargement qu'ils ont passé tant de temps à "chercher" en vain. D'après les archives, la dîme couvre une décennie terrienne et son quota est fixé à mille unités de cargaison. Or, le gouverneur a retenu une centaine d'unités lors des cinq derniers envois. Ce qui signifie que ce monde n'a pas de réelles difficultés à fournir régulièrement son tribut. Nous pouvons donc considérer que l'affaire est close. »

languages.text: "Ja, den Datablock mit der Frachtchronik, nach dem sie so lange vergeblich 'gesucht' haben. Den Aufzeichnungen zufolge ist der Zehnt-Zeitraum ein Terra-Jahrzehnt, und die geforderte Quote sind tausend Frachteinheiten. Der Gouverneur hat von den letzten fünf Lieferungen jeweils hundert Einheiten zurückgehalten. Diese Welt hat also gar keine Schwierigkeiten, ihren Tribut regelmäßig zu bezahlen. Wir können den Fall als geschlossen betrachten."
languages.original_text: "Yes, the data-slate with the shipment chronicle that they spent so much time vainly 'searching' for. According to the records, the tithe period is one Terran decade and the quota prescribed is a thousand cargo units. The governor withheld a hundred units from each of the five most recent shipments. That means this world has no actual difficulty regularly supplying its tribute. We can consider that matter settled."

Der Gouverneur hat von den letzten fünf Lieferungen jeweils hundert Einheiten zurückgehalten. Diese Welt hat also gar keine Schwierigkeiten, ihren Tribut regelmäßig zu bezahlen. Wir können den Fall als geschlossen betrachten."
